commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: C'mon, Prez! Your face looks so glum!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Please cheer up. While the whole School Idol Festival situation is disappointing, I'm glad to have you back, you know?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Totally! You've been working a little too hard!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm so happy you're around to watch us practice again!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I agree with Shizuku. We didn't feel complete without you at practice.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Mm-hmm, and I've been working super hard even though you weren't around... So I want some more attention from you, okay?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Do you hear what everyone's saying? Now it's time for you to pick yourself up too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Honoka, Chika, and the others have all told you not to take the full burden on your own. So, please...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, guys. I'm sorry for making you all look out for me. You really don't have to say such nice things after how everything's turned out...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Don't look down. We have 600 people offering to volunteer thanks to you leading the way with your concerted efforts.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We started off with only the front seats of the auditorium filled and now we've got 600 people! I think that's pretty impressive!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But even with everyone's help, we haven't reached the number we told Shioriko we'd get. There's also the situation with Ayumu...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ah...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I wonder what's up with Ayumu...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: K-Kasumi, shush!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu hasn't come to practice at all since that day.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Sometimes you just need some time to yourself. Let's have faith in Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. I mean, she always seemed like she had so much fun during practice.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: R-Right. I'll believe in her.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, look at the time! I should be heading off for the day soon.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ack! I've got plans today too!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I was asked to man the restaurant today!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You guys can all head off first. I'm gonna stick around for a little longer.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, but...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We're worried about leaving you here all on your own.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, I've been neglecting my practice notebooks so I have a lot of notes to write down. But it's embarrassing to have you guys watch me do it, you know?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yay! You're gonna write notes about us again?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* If that's the case then we should head off. Make sure you put your head down and fill up those pages, okay?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: For sure! Great job, everyone!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* ...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (What have I been doing? I wanted to support my school idols, but I've been completely useless. I've ruined everyone's dreams...)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I didn't listen to anyone and acted recklessly on my own. I even hurt Ayumu really badly.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (She was so quick to hop on board when I suggested she become a school idol. She pulled off an amazing performance at the school tour and made us all proud.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Yet after all of that, I still said such terrible things to her.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want Ayumu to at least go back to loving the club. Anyway, I gotta write up my practice notes.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Oh, this is the present Ayumu tried to give me the other day.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I didn't mean to, but I batted away this present that she put so much thought into for me. Seriously, what was up with me?)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's a notebook. Oh, that's right. I did mention to Ayumu that I'd almost filled up my last one. She remembered...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Um, this is a present for you. Shioriko and I picked it out together. We want to thank you for everything you do. There's a little surprise from everyone on the first page.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, I guess it's not a surprise if I tell you in advance. Umm, even if it's after your phone call, please come to club practice today. Then we can all be together for the--

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: She mentioned some kind of surprise. I wonder what she was talking about?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, there are messages from everyone written here! Ai, Karin, Shizuku... Everyone's written such nice things for me.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Teehee. Were you surprised by everyone's messages? Uh-huh, I bet you were. I think we came up with a pretty sweet present for you thanks to Shioriko's great idea.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Okay, I'll start writing my message here.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: First up, thanks for inviting me to join the School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I was a little surprised at first, but I remember the mysterious feeling of reassurance the moment I saw the sparkle in your eyes.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I started practicing to be a school idol, met everyone, and shared the same dream with them... No words can describe the happiness I feel over finding such amazing companions.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: From the moment I wake up every day, I'm just so excited to go to school because I wonder what wonderful things are waiting for me.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You always have your gaze focused straight ahead, and sometimes I worry that you're trying too hard, but I can really give it my all because I have you with me.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I hope you'll continue to support me, and everyone else, from right by our side.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: From Ayumu

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Urk... *Sob*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I didn't understand how Ayumu felt at all. I don't have the faintest idea about how to apologize to her.
